front: Welcome to Flash Codes. Click on this card to continue the tutorial.
back: Clicking on a card flips it to the back. Click on wrong or correct to continue.

front: You can also press the left key for wrong and the right key for correct.
back: Press the left or right key to continue

front: You can press the down key to flip the card.
back: Choose wrong or right to continue.

front: Your score will be displayed on when you are done.
